task.prompt: A projection takes $\begin{pmatrix} 1 \\ -2 \end{pmatrix}$ to $\begin{pmatrix} \frac{3}{2} \\ -\frac{3}{2} \end{pmatrix}.$  Which vector does the projection take $\begin{pmatrix} -4 \\ 1 \end{pmatrix}$ to?
